attractions.name: Chellah
attractions.description: Explore the ancient ruins and gardens of Chellah, a historic site in Rabat.

attractions.name: Museum Mohamed VI of Modern and Contemporary Art
attractions.description: Escape the rain and visit this modern art museum, featuring works by Moroccan and international artists.

attractions.name: Café Maure
attractions.description: Enjoy a cup of traditional Moroccan mint tea and a snack at this cozy café located in the Kasbah of the Udayas.
attractions.address: Kasbah of the Udayas, Rabat, Morocco

attractions.name: Le Dhow
attractions.description: Indulge in a delicious Moroccan meal at this restaurant, known for its seafood and stunning views of the Bou Regreg river.
